__e: Now, isn't it a fact, Mr. Taylor, that you were knocked unconscious by this man before the fatal blow was struck and that you couldn't possibly have seen the blow that caused the death of the victim?
- Is it not true, is it not a fact, since you offered to testify, you get the money?
Master, Hsiangwants to ask you... ifl came here when Iwas 16.
My dear friends, shall we drop the pretenses now?
Is not it time for you to go home?
Isn’t it time for you to live YOUR BEST LIFE?
If the man in the car is not the one who she was meeting then why hasn't the innocent one come forward?
Isn't is the business that we hear when... the young boy, Jesus, was lost for a matter of three days or so? And they said to him, "Why didn't you follow us?
Isn't it possible that while you were in this condition... you might have done quite a number of things you don't remember?
